name: Maybe
short_description: Open-source personal finance OS for managing accounts, investments, and transactions.
description: Open-source personal finance OS for managing accounts, investments, and transactions. Maybe is a self-hosted application focused on finance, productivity, accounting, self-hosted. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Maybe on your home server to open-source personal finance os for managing accounts, investments, and transactions without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Maybe to manage your finance workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
